connect20/mw_mapple.name: connect20/mw_mapple

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/mw_mapple.description: With the purpose of support your e-business for free, Mage-World is glad to introduce new free theme mApple. This Magento theme has the advantage of clean and clear design which is suitable for wide variety of products.
